query: Python 3.13 features, release information, and capabilities
steps: Step 1: Research Python 3.13 official release date, version number, and general availability status from the Python.org website and official documentation
Step 2: Identify and document major new features introduced in Python 3.13, including performance improvements, language syntax changes, and standard library enhancements
Step 3: Investigate deprecated features and breaking changes in Python 3.13 that may affect existing code compatibility
Step 4: Analyze performance benchmarks and improvements specific to Python 3.13, including JIT compilation capabilities and memory optimization features
Step 5: Review new standard library modules, updated APIs, and improvements to existing libraries in Python 3.13
Step 6: Compile migration guide information and best practices for upgrading from previous Python versions to Python 3.13
